name: Marble Story
description:
Just a marble going on a quick trip in search of ___?
GAMEPLAY
  • Roll around and use launchers to boost you further
  • Examine the area and plan your moves before you execute them
  • Use momentum to reach greater heights
  • And of course, don't fall down too much
  • Try to beat my personal best: 38.42 seconds :)
TIPS
  • Momentum is important to progress in the starting area
  • Use launchers to move around the areas instead of moving manually
  • Take your time, it's all about memorization and execution
  • Screen transitions might be jarring at first, but once you learn the layout of the level and nail the movement, the game opens up quite nicely

A huge thanks to Szadiart for the art assets! I've only recently known about this jam and had just under 2 days to make a game and I couldn't have done it without his/her work.

Note: If you encounter the bug where you aren't on screen, just move to different room so you'll most likely have to backtrack. You'll have to do it blind though since the camera is stuck.
